entry.title: New release for undb: v0.10.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Merge main into develop branch by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1553
  • chore(deps): update dependency @swc/core to v1.3.88 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1556
  • chore/style by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1557
  • chore: upgrade dependencies by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1558
  • chore(deps): update dependency @swc/core to v1.3.89 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1559
  • chore(deps): update dependency @swc/core to v1.3.90 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1562
  • feature: base by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1548
  • chore: upgrade dependencies by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1563
  • fix: dropdown checkbox should not close dropdown automatically by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1564
  • fix/styles by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1566
  • style: base card n tables by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1567
  • Release version v0.10.0 by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1568

Full Changelog: https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/compare/v0.9.1...v0.10.0

entry.title: New release for undb: v0.10.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Merge main into develop branch by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1569
  • chore/create table button by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1571
  • fix/view issues by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1572
  • refactor: use svelte sooner show toast message by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1573
  • feat: create form from view confirm modal by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1574
  • feat: delete table confirm modal by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1575
  • refactor/calendar view by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1578
  • fix: fix some i18n issue by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1579
  • fix: fix get tables populate by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1581
  • feature/base template by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1582
  • feature/create base with template file by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1583
  • Release version v0.10.1 by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1584

Full Changelog: https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/compare/v0.10.0...v0.10.1

entry.title: New release for undb: v0.10.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Merge main into develop branch by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1585
  • chore(deps): update dependency @swc/core to v1.3.91 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1586

  • style: create base modal ui by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1588
  • chore(deps): update dependency lucide-svelte to ^0.282.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1589
  • fix: fix issue with dropdown menu not displaying when clicked by @WanShufen in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1591
  • chore(deps): update dependency lucide-svelte to ^0.284.0 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1592
  • fix(deps): update dependency @asteasolutions/zod-to-openapi to v6 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1590
  • fix: fix missing default base id for create table by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1594
  • Create base command handler test by @WanShufen in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1595
  • test: test delete base command handler by @WanShufen in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1593

  • fix: fix cannot create webhook by @nichenqin in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1605

entry.title: New release for undb: v0.11.0
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Merge main into develop branch by @github-actions in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1643
  • chore(deps): update dependency tailwind-merge to v2 by @renovate in https://github.com/undb-xyz/undb/pull/1644
